payload.value_template:
{% set mapping = {'auto':'自動沸き上げ','manualNoHeating':'手動沸き上げ停止','manualHeating':'手動沸き上げ'} %}
{{ mapping.get(value, 'unknown') }}
payload.command_template:
{% set mapping = {'自動沸き上げ':'auto','手動沸き上げ停止':'manualNoHeating','手動沸き上げ':'manualHeating'} %}
{{ mapping[value] }}
payload.name: 沸き上げ自動設定
